data.title: The Talent Manager
data.meta_description: Profile SummaryI am a confident, organized, and diligent producer with extensive experience in both self-shooting and directing multicamera setups. My technical expertise as a self-shooting PD, combined with my comfort in directing crews and working as an edit producer, makes me a versatile asset to...
data.text:
Having worked with Jonny over many series and in numerous edits over the years, I can safely say he is a great addition to any team. He is passionate about making the best show possible. He cares about contributors and the team around him on the ground. He has a real talent for directing and teaching others this skill. Jonny is a team player and someone I hope to work with again soon.

Alex Lambrinos
